uniol.apt.generator.philnet

Class QuadstatePhilNetGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.generator.philnet.QuadstatePhilNetGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PhilNetGenerator

    public class QuadstatePhilNetGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate a philosophers net Each philosopher has four states: thinking, where he don't hold forks waiting, where he holds his own fork and waits for the fork of his neighbor eating, where he hold his and his neighbors forks cleaning, where he holds his own fork
    Author:
    vsp
